text: Nasir-ud-Din Mahmud Shah Tughluq (reign: 1394-February 1413 CE) was the last sultan of the Tughlaq dynasty. Tughlaq dynasty is the third dynasty of the Delhi Sultanate. During his reign in 1398, Amir Timur the Turkic ruler invaded India. Soon after the invasion, the Tughlaq dynasty gradually came to an end." ==Successor== After Mahmud's rule, Khizr Khan found the Sayyid dynasty. ==References== Category:Tughlaq dynasty Category:Sultans Category:1413 deaths Category:15th century in India Category:14th century in India
title: Nasir-ud-Din Mahmud Shah Tughluq
